   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Books Management System documentation
=====================================

Book Management System that allows users to manage books and reviews. It includes a **RESTful API** built with **FastAPI** and a book recommendation system using **KNN**.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: User Manual:

   Overview <README>
   modules

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Developer Reference:

   Api <api_testing>

   GitHub <https://github.com/Darshan-dlr/BooksLibrary>
